verbose_text: ER-400583-00 at a dose of 100 mg/kg decreased the amount of HIF-1alpha to less than 10% of that in control tumors 3 h after administration, and the suppressive effect was sustained for 24 h. qPCR analysis revealed that the administration of ER-400583-00 at 100 mg/kg significantly decreased mRNA levels of the HIF-1 target genes CA9, VEGFA, and SLC2A1 24 h after treatment (XREF_FIG).
